Name: Dark Mist Fortress Postcard
Description: Hidden within the crumbling expanse of the Ruins of Andra City, the Dark Mist Legion, driven by its mission to bring down Asterleeds, has carved out a secret base...
Description$english: Hidden within the crumbling expanse of the Ruins of Andra City, the Dark Mist Legion, driven by its mission to bring down Asterleeds, has carved out a secret base...
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
